name: netsniffer
description: NetSniffer - 基于 Electron 的现代化网络抓包工具，支持 HTTP/HTTPS 请求拦截和分析

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run renderer-dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron-dev"
scripts.compile: npm run compile-main && npm run compile-renderer
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run compile
scripts.build:test: npm run clean:dist && cross-env API_ENV=test npm run compile
scripts.build:release: npm run clean:dist && cross-env API_ENV=release npm run compile
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:dist && cross-env API_ENV=prod npm run compile
scripts.dist: npm run clean:all && npm run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --win --x64 --publish never && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:test: npm run clean:all && npm run build:test && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --win --x64 --publish never && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:release: npm run clean:all && npm run build:release && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --win --x64 --publish never && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:prod: npm run clean:all && npm run build:prod && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --win --x64 --publish never && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:mac: npm run clean:all && npm run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:mac:test: npm run clean:all && npm run build:test && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:mac:prod: npm run clean:all && npm run build:prod && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:win: npm run clean:all && npm run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:win:test: npm run clean:all && npm run build:test && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:win:prod: npm run clean:all && npm run build:prod && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:linux: npm run clean:all && npm run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --linux --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:linux:test: npm run clean:all && npm run build:test && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --linux --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.dist:linux:prod: npm run clean:all && npm run build:prod && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --linux --x64 && npm run clean:unpacked
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:release
